html:
10.16.19  3:44 pm   what is the normal amount of existential crises to have in a week? 

     if you can get into 1 really big one and just stay there all week, you're good to go

10.16.19  3:05 pm   can you vibrato with your voice?

     sure

      and can you belt?

     maybe not

10.16.19  3:01 pm   10.15.19  3:47 am could we get a follow up answer to this?

     they must change colors to allow folks to pass through from different directions. it's hard to imagine which direction gets to go first

10.16.19  2:42 pm   Whats ur opinion on those stupid just did a bad thing tik toks, stealing ur song, now a bunch of kids are going around singing ur song without knowing the origin

     what can i say, sometimes popularity seems stupid. but that would be your opinion, not mine

10.16.19  2:24 pm   why is how?

     to find a way

10.16.19  2:19 pm   do you ever submit questions on your questions page?

     sometimes to test, but they don't get answered or posted here. in other words, none of the purple text is ever from me

10.16.19  1:59 pm   today marks an event that was extremely traumatic to me, and i'm feeling kind of down. what do you do to cheer yourself up?

     songs can be useful for that

10.16.19  1:56 pm   what is your opinion on freshwater shrimp

     i prefer fresh shrimpwater

10.16.19  1:46 pm   opinion on fish?

     they are swimmy

10.16.19  12:50 pm   Technically Oxygen and Hydrogen have the wrong names, as Oxygen means "Acid-forming" whilst Hydrogen means "Water-forming" and the name Oxygen was given when it was believed that all acids had Oxygen in them, and as Hydrogen was discovered by splitting water, it was given the name Hydrogen. Now, it is now known that all acids actually contain Hydrogen (Hydrochloric Acid or HCl has no Oxygen) so what we call Hydrogen should actually be called Oxygen and thus what we call Oxygen should actually be called Hydrogen. Opinions?

     such a common tale

10.16.19  11:51 am   Will you be upset if I try to be like you?

     i am upset no matter what

10.16.19  11:45 am   if a beehive has no bees, is it still a beehive

     yes

10.16.19  10:59 am   i know i sound like a total amateur, but damnn what's the genre for minutes 1:53 to 2:20 on at the airport terminal??? it's just so good

     the first step, i think, in making any decent content of any kind, is you're gonna want to take all those genres and roll them over with a steamroller

10.16.19  10:39 am   10.14.19  2:55 pm any hint about what other sorts of other things?

     here's some of the things i would Like to do:
make full length 3D (stereoscopic) feature films.
make stereoscopic 3D video of a variety of other lengths and types, besides feature films.
continue to make use of the 2D screen, as long as that's still what the viewers have available.
utilize drone cameras
utilize motion capture technology
utilize and work with actors
create a camera rig to be able to perform actual camera movements and have them be recorded as virtual camera movements in a 3D graphics environment
make software
make hardware
do a major scientific breakthrough in particle/quantum physics
make VR content
make AR content
continue doing heaps and heaps of music and songs
continue to use music and musical scoring as the secret most dangerous weapon of visual media content
do heaps and heaps more musical improvisation
produce that musical improvisation in heaps of different ways
do cover songs
do non-musical improvisation. produce and write from that improvisation in heaps of ways
do a talk show
would like to meet tom cruise, if possible

10.16.19  10:31 am   how do I accept my communist friend?

     first you're gonna wanna go ahead and convert to communism

10.16.19  10:11 am   i try to help people and it doesn't work. any advice?

     try some of the help on yourself and see if that helps you see what may not be working about it

10.16.19  9:19 am   Why is the flute good?

     because it's very high

10.16.19  8:21 am   how do i tie a shoe 

     impossible

10.16.19  7:55 am   if i'm missing my right shoe can i put my left shoe in the mirror to make a new right shoe?

     only with a smartmirror

10.16.19  7:52 am   How to be confident?

     you know the game "tag", ... (the one where you tag someone and say 'tag, you're it' and then that person's it.) Well, tag, you're it

10.16.19  7:31 am   hey bill i am in paris now? how can i find love

     check the croissants

10.16.19  7:13 am   10.14.19  7:20 pm   i think the original asker meant, what ages you think your audience is?

     i'm not sure, but a huge amount of people like to come on here and ask what their senior quote should be, every year. twice a year it seems. any time of year. i think someone just asked that

10.16.19  6:46 am   You should write a book or start a podcast so we can get to know you better. What are your thoughts?

     i will be doing a talk show

10.16.19  6:44 am   Are you ever going to ever release merch? If you did I'd have to buy it. Maybe you could make some of those buttons that make sounds and are put on a desk. They're pretty funny.

     my favorite type of merchandise, i'm finding out, is audio/visual/musical media

10.16.19  6:36 am   what are dolphins?

     extremely wet dogs. if you don't believe me, then you just haven't seen a dog wet enough. but you actually have, and it's called a dolphin

10.16.19  6:13 am   What shape is the earth?

     most people think it's a cube but it's actually a rectangular prism

10.16.19  3:56 am   Bill, what if my life is all wrong?

     it's already at least somewhat right. that much is plainly clear

10.16.19  3:39 am   why do hotdog have bone in it

     probably not hot enough. must increase the temperature of dog

10.16.19  3:09 am   Hello Bill. Can you describe what deal was with tent entry in Mark Vigeant podcast hackaton? you said "sounds awesome" while reading the paper the girl gave you but it didn't really make any sense while watching it live on twitch.

     i don't think i said anything sounds awesome. what's awesome, i thought, is going on stage and setting up a tent on stage. wonderful idea, hard to believe so few people seem to be doing it these days

10.16.19  2:57 am   do you ever answer a question but don't put it on the main page, but then you put it with the rest of the questions within the random function, so that the only way to find the question is to keep clicking the random button until you find it?

     no

10.16.19  2:06 am   Have you ever seen a baby pigeon?

     i thought all pigeons were babies

10.16.19  2:03 am   How do i stop crying?

     you must finish crying

10.16.19  1:48 am   what will happen when the countdown timer gets to zero?

     presumably some type of media experience that i've created/constructed will become available, or begin to become available

10.16.19  1:42 am   10.15.19  9:39 am which key(s) did you press on your keyboard(s) to type the answer to this question?

     space, on the white apple keyboard

10.16.19  1:18 am   would you consider bringing back "reality"? and if so, please.

     most of it has not yet even been delivered, for the first time. and yes i am considering delivering it, just as i considered delivering the delivery that is there, for so many years before having delivered it

10.16.19  1:16 am   if you could chose one thing to impode into the sun and never come back what would it be

     trash

10.16.19  12:53 am   what inspired you to make ice butter 4dimensional

     i consider that 3 dimensional really

10.15.19  11:38 pm   pick a number between 1 and 10

     a trillion

10.15.19  11:36 pm   do you ever feel overexposed by your online presence or are you cautious to keep it downlow. thanks. 

     i spend most of my time snorkeling, so that's not really an issue

10.15.19  11:11 pm   How much ketchup is enough?

     1 or 2 ounces

10.15.19  10:28 pm   10.13.19  1:21 pm https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loess is this the 'loess' your songs are mostly about

     that is what i meant, although it's not true

10.15.19  10:20 pm   what aren't you inspired by?

     a 2 person conversation in a movie/film/video, being recorded separately for each person. actually, nevermind i am inspired by that because it inspires me to find a way to do it better

10.15.19  9:33 pm   what do i do if i leave all my friends but its not on purpose and now i dont have friends?

     start writing

10.15.19  9:30 pm   what are you planning on possibly making in the future, besides songs and videos?

     i can't tell you

10.15.19  9:21 pm   What is your opinion on Flamin' Hot Cheetos?

     they have a very interesting temperature

10.15.19  9:20 pm   what do you think about the universe?

     it's very ..... twisty

10.15.19  9:14 pm   Could you tell us where the fun went? We still have no answer!

     that's not true. 3.10.17 9:32 pm, 8.17.16 6:49 pm

10.15.19  9:04 pm   10.14.19  12:13 pm

Same person here.
Ok. So, if I bought an official backing track of a song and then sing and record my voice to that song, would I want to add mastering effects (compression, limiter, etc) on the entire mix as well or just the vocals alone? 

     do the vocals first and then maybe a tiny bit to the master. everything we're talking about has to do with volume. so really, actually, the only way to truly do this right is to go through the whole song and adjust the volume of each word, pretty much. to make sure it is at the right level compared to the rest of the music

10.15.19  9:03 pm   have you ever tasted the colour purple

     i was going to say yes but now that i think about it no. actually yes
